task_description:
# Implement Mobile-First Responsive Design

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-82](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-82/implement-mobile-first-responsive-design)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Breakpoints, touch targets, mobile nav

patterns.theme_pattern: MUI theme with createLightTheme/createDarkTheme functions, uses tokens from separate file
patterns.styling_pattern: Emotion CSS-in-JS with MUI sx prop for responsive styling
patterns.component_pattern: Functional React components with TypeScript, Material-UI components
patterns.touch_targets: Already have minHeight: 44px for buttons and touch elements in theme
patterns.existing_responsive: useMediaQuery hook used in CTASection.tsx, breakpoints.down('sm') pattern

existing_implementations.description: Found existing touch target standards (44px minimum) in theme, touch.css file with touch-action styles, and some responsive patterns using useMediaQuery

observations.breakpoints: No custom breakpoints defined yet - using MUI defaults
observations.touch_targets: Good foundation with 44px minimums in Button/IconButton theme overrides
observations.responsive_patterns: Limited responsive implementation - only CTASection uses useMediaQuery
observations.navigation: Header and Sidebar are fixed width (260px) with no mobile responsiveness
observations.layout: Layout.tsx uses fixed drawer width with no responsive behavior
